text:
Hiori, are you ready to head back?
The car to pick us up should be here soon.

Thank you.
I had a really good practice during the training camp.
At first, I was a bit tense, but...

Oh, I'm glad to hear that you were able to relax and focus on your
lessons. Seems like you've learned a lot from the experience.

Yes, well... there were various things that happened,
so I feel like I've gained a lot from it.

In that case, I'd be happy to arrange another opportunity like this for you.
Hopefully, next time you'll be able to approach it with even more relaxation.
